short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play GuessWhereYouAre.com with just one click! This extension lets you start a quick game of GuessWhereYouAre in the blink of an eye

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly open GuessWhereYouAre.com in a new quick window with just one click! This extension is designed for fans of location-based games, allowing quick access to explore GuessWhereYouAre’s immersive, free, open and unlimited guesser game.

What’s GuessWhereYouAre.com?
GuessWhereYouAre is a free, open alternative to GeoGuessr, perfect for geography enthusiasts! Dive into stunning Street View locations worldwide, sharpen your geographic skills, and enjoy endless exploration—right from your browser. It's your passport to virtual world exploration! You’ll be transported to mysterious locations around the globe. Use your detective skills to figure out where you are and make your guess on the world map. The closer your guess, the more points you earn!

Key Features:
- Free Unlimited Play - No subscriptions, no ads, no daily limits, just pure fun!
- Global Exploration - Thousands of locations to discover
- Real-time Scoring - Instant feedback on your guesses
- Mobile-Friendly - Play seamlessly across devices
- Educational Fun - Learn geography while enjoying yourself

How to Play:
- Open GuessWhereYouAre in a new extension popup
- Explore your surroundings in Street View
- Look for clues like: Road signs, languages, and architecture, Local plants, weather, and which side cars drive on
- Place your guess on the world map
- See how close you were and collect points!

Perfect For:
- Students learning geography
- Travel enthusiasts
- Puzzle lovers
- Virtual explorers
- Casual gamers looking for fun

Pro Tips to Boost Your Score:
- Recognize road signs from different countries
- Familiarize yourself with architecture styles
- Notice regional vegetation
- Look for text on signs and buildings
- Observe which side cars drive on

Why Install GuessWhereYouAre?
- Engages your mind and makes learning geography fun
- Perfect for quick breaks or to challenge your skills
- Discover new places and cultures around the world
- Share the excitement with friends and family

Ready for Your Next Adventure?
Install GuessWhereYouAre now and unlock endless exploration right from your Chrome browser!
